title: LitMap
description: Interactive map visualizing literature and authors across geography and time.

title: ClueChain
description: Word puzzle game with progressive clue reveals. Guess 10 words using cryptic, indirect, and straight clues.

title: AI Demystified
description: Web-based GenAI course for students aged 12-18 with quiz-first learning and interactive glossary.

title: NOVA
description: Neurodiverse-oriented supportive AI chatbot with emotion detection and personalized guidance.

title: Tabletalk
description: Natural language CSV querying tool. Ask questions in English, get SQL/pandas results instantly.

title: Globetrek
description: Geography exploration game connecting neighboring countries and cultural knowledge.

title: Lifelines
description: Timeline-based trivia game testing knowledge of when historical figures were alive.

title: Games of History
description: Collection of historical game concepts and design explorations through time periods.

title: PhotoScribe
description: AI-powered Google Photos cataloger using HuggingFace Florence-2 for automatic image captioning.

title: TravelLens
description: Photo-based travel journal and location tracker for documenting adventures.

title: Infinite Quiz
description: AI-generated quiz system creating endless personalized questions on any topic.

title: Pivot Master
description: Canvas-based game showcasing iterative game design through multiple development stages.

title: Risk Dashboard
description: Monte Carlo simulation dashboard for project risk analysis and probability modeling.

title: YT Education
description: Educational video series on AI concepts with knowledge distillation and visual explanations.

title: Studio Dashboard
description: This visual project hub showcasing all creative work in a card-based interface.

title: Hexagons
description: Generative art project exploring hexagonal patterns and mathematical beauty.
